content: MT-B-G AS OC Base connector Hot-dip galvanized base connector for fastening MT-70 and MT-80 girders to structural steel in moderately corrosive environments ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features A faster and more economical solution for installing girder cantilevers directly to steel beams Compatible with powder-actuated threaded studs for steel and MT Thread Forming Bolt channel connectors – for much faster, adaptable assembly Corrosion resistance – hot-dip galvanized to help protect against moisture and chemical corrosion Part of the Hilti MT system – an economical, all-in-one solution for virtually all modular MEP support structures Applications Fastening MT-70 and MT-80 girders to steel beams Suitable for use in moderately corrosive environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Q355 or better steel Surface finish: Outdoor Coated - HDG Material thickness: 6 mm Technical Data | Material composition | Q355 or better steel | Surface finish | Outdoor Coated - HDG | Material thickness | 6 mm | Weight | 1.2 lb | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) ### ITEMS- 2332781 - Baseplate MT-B-G AS OC - Package Size 10 pc
